Description: Microsoft Dynamics CRM is a customer relationship management software package.  This Connector is for an on-premises installation of version 2011 to 2016.
Name: Microsoft Dynamics CRM (on-premises)

Methods.Name: Create Task
Methods.Description: Creates a new task for the specified contact.

Methods.Name: List Marketing Lists
Methods.Description: Gets the Marketing Lists.

Methods.Name: Create New Marketing List
Methods.Description: Creates a new mailing list.

Methods.Name: Get Marketing List By Name
Methods.Description: Gets a Marketing List from Dynamics by name.

Methods.Name: List Updated Marketing Lists
Methods.Description: Gets the updated marketing lists since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Marketing List
Methods.Description: Gets a Marketing List from Dynamics by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Marketing Lists
Methods.Description: Gets the Marketing Lists added since the last run date.

Methods.Name: List New And Updated Products
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all products in Dynamics added or updated since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Updated Products
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all products in Dynamics updated since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Product
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all products in Dynamics.

Methods.Name: List New Products
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all products in Dynamics added since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Products
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all products in Dynamics.

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets the new contacts added to Dynamics since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: List New and Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets the new and updated contacts added to Dynamics since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Gets a contact from Dynamics.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets updated contacts in Dynamics since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Get Contact(s) By Email Address
Methods.Description: Gets all matching contacts from Dynamics by email address.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: Deletes a contact.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Creates a new contact.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Updates a contact.

Methods.Name: List New Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets the new contacts added to Dynamics since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: List Teams
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all teams.

Methods.Name: List Sales Orders
Methods.Description: Gets all sales orders.

Methods.Name: List New Sales Orders
Methods.Description: Get sales orders that have been created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List New and Updated Sales Orders
Methods.Description: Gets sales orders that have been created or updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Sales Order
Methods.Description: Gets a sales order, specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List System Users
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all system users in Dynamics.

Methods.Name: Get System User
Methods.Description: Gets a system user from Dynamics by ID.

Methods.Name: List Campaign Responses
Methods.Description: List campaign responses.

Methods.Name: Get Campaign Response
Methods.Description: Get a campaign response.

Methods.Name: Delete Campaign Response
Methods.Description: Delete a campaign response.

Methods.Name: Link Contact to Campaign Response
Methods.Description: Link a contact to a campaign response.

Methods.Name: Update Campaign Response
Methods.Description: Update a campaign response that is bound to a campaign.

Methods.Name: Create Campaign Response
Methods.Description: Create a campaign response that is bound to a campaign.

Methods.Name: Remove Member(s) from Static List
Methods.Description: Removes Members from a Static Marketing List.

Methods.Name: List Static Lead Lists
Methods.Description: Get static marketing lists.

Methods.Name: List Static List's Contacts
Methods.Description: Get static list contacts.

Methods.Name: List Static Lists
Methods.Description: Get static marketing lists.

Methods.Name: Add Member(s) to Static List
Methods.Description: Adds Marketing List Members.

Methods.Name: List Static List's Accounts
Methods.Description: Get static list's accounts.

Methods.Name: List Static List's Leads
Methods.Description: Get static lead list contacts.

Methods.Name: List Dynamic List's Accounts
Methods.Description: Get Accounts of a dynamic marketing lead list.

Methods.Name: List Updated Dynamic Lists
Methods.Description: Gets the updated dynamic marketing lists since last run.

Methods.Name: List Dynamic List's Contacts
Methods.Description: Get contacts for a dynamic list.

Methods.Name: List Dynamic List's Leads
Methods.Description: Get Contacts of a dynamic marketing lead list.

Methods.Name: List Dynamic Lists
Methods.Description: Get dynamic marketing lists.

Methods.Name: List Dynamic Lead Lists
Methods.Description: Get dynamic marketing lists.

Methods.Name: List New Dynamic Lists
Methods.Description: Gets the new dynamic marketing lists since last run.

Methods.Name: Create Campaign
Methods.Description: Create a campaign.

Methods.Name: Delete Campaign
Methods.Description: Delete a campaign.

Methods.Name: Get Campaign By Name
Methods.Description: Gets a campaign by name. Leaves through the True Exit if found, else through the False Exit. If multiple matches are found, only the first is returned.

Methods.Name: List Campaigns
Methods.Description: Gets all campaigns in Dynamics.

Methods.Name: Update Campaign
Methods.Description: Update an existing campaign.

Methods.Name: Get Campaign
Methods.Description: Gets a campaign from Dynamics.

Methods.Name: Delete Lead
Methods.Description: Deletes a lead.

Methods.Name: List Updated Leads
Methods.Description: Get updated leads.

Methods.Name: List Leads
Methods.Description: Get leads.

Methods.Name: Update Lead
Methods.Description: Update a lead.

Methods.Name: Create Lead
Methods.Description: Create a new lead.

Methods.Name: List Leads By Email Address
Methods.Description: Gets all matching leads from Dynamics by email address.

Methods.Name: Get Lead
Methods.Description: Gets a lead from Dynamics by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Leads
Methods.Description: Get new leads.

Methods.Name: List New Accounts
Methods.Description: Gets the new accounts added to Dynamics since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Create Account
Methods.Description: Create an account.

Methods.Name: Get Account By Email
Methods.Description: Get an account specified by its email.

Methods.Name: List Accounts
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all accounts in Dynamics.

Methods.Name: Get Account
Methods.Description: Get an account specified by its ID.

Methods.Name: List Updated Accounts
Methods.Description: Gets the updated accounts added to Dynamics since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Delete Account
Methods.Description: Deletes an account.

Methods.Name: Update Account
Methods.Description: Update an existing account.

Methods.Name: Batch Requests
Methods.Description: Perform multiple operations in a single request.

Methods.Name: List New and Updated Accounts
Methods.Description: Gets the new and updated accounts added to Dynamics since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Get Entity Fields
Methods.Description: Get a single entity (e.g. contact)'s fields. Can be used to map additional data that is not currently mapped in a method.

Methods.Name: Get Entity Fields (List Objects)
Methods.Description: Get fields of a List object (for example contacts - as opposed to contact).

Methods.Name: List Roles
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all roles.
